item.title: Make a message show after?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

if(objectID == 2465) { if(playerHasItem(4699, 500)) { triggerTele (3047, 9590, 0); deleteItem(4699, 500); } else { sM("You need 500 lava runes to use this portal"); }

The else means: if something is different then the bracket its connecting which is ‘playerHasItem’… then it will send a message.
(So it’s basicilly if you don’t have 500 lava runes then it’ll send a message)

Read full topic

item.title: Make a message show after?
item.dc:creator: @matthew_javier matthew javier
item.description:
@matthew_javier wrote:

How can I make a message saying that if you don’t have 500 lava runes to use the portal you can’t. But if you have them, there is no message?

My code-

if(objectID == 2465){ if(playerHasItem(4699, 500)) sM("You need 500 lava runes to use this portal"); triggerTele (3047, 9590, 0); deleteItem(4699, 500); }

Read full topic
